mapper.select: select distinct on (cpb.prm_no) cpb.prm_no, cpb.dc_ccd, cpb.dc_val from cc_prm_base cpb inner join cc_cpn_issue cci on cpb.prm_no = cci.prm_no and cci.cpn_use_dt is null and cci.mbr_no = #{mbrNo} inner join cc_prm_aply_tgt cpat on cpb.prm_no = cpat.prm_no and cpat.use_yn = 'Y' and cpat.aply_tgt_ccd = '10' and cpat.aply_tgt_no = #{productNo} and case when cpb.prm_kind_cd = '20' then now() between cpat.sys_reg_dtime and cpat.sys_reg_dtime + interval '1 day' * cpb.prm_std_dd else 1=1 end where cpb.use_yn = 'Y' and CASE WHEN cpb.prm_priod_ccd = '10' THEN now() between cpb.prm_strt_dt and cpb.prm_end_dt + interval '1 day' else 1=1 end
